Destroy authority? It was democracy! No it was weakness.
Clear borders? It was democracy! No, it was a mistake
Communitarianism? It was democracy! No, it was the beginning of the destruction of our society
Multiculturalism? It was democracy! No, it was the opposite of our national identity

We need order, authority, justice, firmness, generosity, loyalty to ourselves and openness

Long live the # Republic we love! Long live #laFranced!
